original_title: Hollywood star Jason Momoa congratulates Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Feb 21- Hollywood star Jason Momoa, best known for his role in the movie Aquaman, congratulated Sri Lanka after the island was declared a UN World Restoration Flagship, in recognition of its vital efforts to rebuild and restore the mangrove ecosystems.
In a UN video, Jason Momoa said Sri Lanka was an example on working together to make positive change.
